mapper.insert: insert into thumbs_up_record (user_id, article_id, thumbs_up_type, thumbs_up_date) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thumbsUpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbsUpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select user_id, article_id, thumbs_up_type, thumbs_up_date from thumbs_up_record
